message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds immense value for us, reflecting its exceptional quality and functionality. Given its significance, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We're offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $10,000, which we believe strikes a balance between fair compensation for us and a reasonable investment for you, considering its worth to you is $8,000. We're confident this deal presents an opportunity for both parties to benefit. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
